title: Are Team Builder role icons still available to earn?
body: Are Team Builder role icons still available to earn after playing 5 games as a role?

replies.body: Teambuilder icons are no longer available, and is not currently a mode right now.  An improved system has been implemented which can be found in Ranked and Draft normals, and with it the end of the teambuilder icons.  I don't have any news or information on the icons coming back right now.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up but let me know if you have any questions.
